org.randomstack.jme

Class ApplicationGlobals

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.randomstack.jme.ApplicationGlobals

  • public final class ApplicationGlobals
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton implementation that holds an Application object for easy retrieval. The initialize(Application) method should be called before this singleton can be used. When the JmeLauncher class is used as a starting point, the ApplicationGlobals singleton will be already correctly initialized.
